6.name: Payment Module x1
6.request:
SELECT COUNT(distinct m.id_module) FROM PREFIX_hook h LEFT JOIN PREFIX_hook_module hm ON h.id_hook = hm.id_hook LEFT JOIN PREFIX_module m ON hm.id_module = m.id_module
WHERE (h.name = "displayPayment" OR h.name = "payment") AND m.name NOT IN ("bankwire", "cheque", "cashondelivery")

WHERE (h.name = "displayPayment" OR h.name = "payment") AND m.name NOT IN ("bankwire", "cheque", "cashondelivery")

31.name: Revenue > 100 (Base EUR)
31.request:

FROM PREFIX_orders o INNER JOIN PREFIX_currency c ON c.id_currency = o.id_currency WHERE valid = 1 AND reference != "XKBKNABJK"

76.name: North America
76.request:
SELECT IFNULL(id_order, 0) FROM PREFIX_orders o LEFT JOIN PREFIX_address a ON o.id_address_delivery = a.id_address LEFT JOIN PREFIX_country c ON c.id_country = a.id_country WHERE o.valid = 1 AND a.id_country != "{config}PS_COUNTRY_DEFAULT{/config}" AND c.iso_code IN (
"CA",
"GL",
"PM",
"US"
)

320.name: Module shopgate installed

375.name: Module shopgate active
375.request: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PREFIX_orders o LEFT JOIN PREFIX_order_state os ON os.id_order_state = o.current_state WHERE o.module like "%shopgate%" AND os.logable = 1 AND o.date_add > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 90 DAY)

376.name: Module shopgate superactive
376.request: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PREFIX_orders o LEFT JOIN PREFIX_order_state os ON os.id_order_state = o.current_state WHERE o.module like "%shopgate%" AND os.logable = 1 AND o.date_add > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 90 DAY)

advices_16.name: Online Merchant Training
advices_16.selector: .toolbar-placeholder:eq(0), form#invoice_date_form, form#product,  form#form-product, form#store,  form#form-store, form#category,  form#form-category

advices_lang_16.html:
Hint
Readclose
Stuck? Time to become a PrestaShop Ninja! Learn how to use your Back-Office and start managing your online shop 50% faster!
  PrestaShop User Online Training

Are you a new online merchant and want to learn how to use your new Back-Office, discover new features and start selling quickly? Don’t lose any time. Join our comprehensive online training hosted by PrestaShop training experts, right from the comfort of your home!

Close More information

Advice
Joinclose
Help us translate PrestaShop 1.6 into your language by joining us on Crowdin!
Discover the Power of 3500+ Modules and Themes to enhance your PrestaShop Store!

Advice
Learn moreClose
About to upgrade? How about giving your opinion on future releases before anyone else?

Advice
ReadClose
Did you know that 62% of comparison-site shoppers are very likely to make a purchase and spend 25% more than other online consumers ?
Advice Shopping Feed

Shopping Feed is a feed management system: easily promote and sell your products on price comparison websites and marketplaces.

Price comparison sites are an excellent source of qualified traffic and offer:

- lower average cost-per-click (CPC)

- higher conversion rates, since internet users who click your link have already seen the price, photo, description and sometimes even the delivery cost.

Marketplaces are an excellent sales vector:

- they see massive flows of daily traffic

 

- Internet users who visit these marketplaces are already in a purchasing mindset

Close Learn more

Advice
ReadClose
Surveys show that only 9% of executives are happy with the way they spend their time at work.

Tips of the day

Need to retain your customers?

With Shopgate’s push notifications, keep in touch with your customers wherever they are, anytime!

More information?
Tips of the day

Want more sales?

Up to 10x more sales on a Shopgate mobile website with help from integrated marketing tools.

More information?
Tips of the day

Your average cart is too low?

Double your average cart value with a native module provided by Shopgate, this allows you to focus your promotions on loyal customers.

More information?
Tips of the day

Your conversion rate is too low?

With Shopgate, you can triple your conversion rate with an optimized mobile website that allows customers to purchase with only two clicks.

More information?
Tips of the day

Build a loyal customer base

20% of regular customers represent 40% of the turnover; build loyalty with the native module provided by Shopgate.

More information?

Are you sure?

Start accepting payments now. It’s that simple.

Are you sure?

Stop scathing reviews. New app resolves customer complaints in minutes.

Tips of the day

8 people out of 10 remember the company name of promotional objects they use.

Promotional objects appeal to all senses and make it easier for customers to remember your brand.

Create yours with 50% discount!
Tips of the day

Making the right first impression is key!

Give a professional image of your business to your prospects and customers thanks to high-quality and well designed business cards.

Create yours with 50% discount!
